评论详情: I own a similar style crop tank from Lululemon, and honestly, I like this one even better! The material is super soft, breathable, and has just the right amount of stretch. I’m usually a small, and the sizing was spot on—fits perfectly without feeling too tight or restrictive.  Compared to my Lululemon top, this one is slightly less compressive, which makes it more comfortable for all-day wear. While Lululemon offers more support for intense workouts, it also squeezes my lats a bit too much, causing some unflattering bulging. This top, however, provides great coverage and support without that issue. The U-back design is both stylish and functional, keeping everything in place while still looking flattering.  Overall, this is an amazing dupe at a fraction of the price! Perfect for workouts, lounging, or even dressing up with jeans. I love it so much that I’m already planning to buy more colors! Highly recommend!

评论概述: I will live in these all summer
评论详情: Detailed review ahead (girl, be ready for a novel)….I have to say first that I am a die hard lululemon fan, but I work as a choreographer every summer for a well respected theatre camp. Last year, all my lululemon running shorts and most of my tanks were on their last leg. I had heard about these online and wanted to give them a try as an alternative for summer camp, as I could spend less and buy more colors to mix and match. WOW! For the money you can’t go wrong.  I purchased the white, black, denim blue, and jade green tanks and the matching mesh lined high waist running shorts. I am 5’7 and your typical smedium 32dd. I ordered medium across the board. I rapidly lose weight over the summer due to the heat and the exercise. I feel these will fit me if I fluctuate as low as about 15 pounds lighter.  Tanks- These are fantastic. They are not for super high impact, but for lower/ medium impact dance they are great. I can also see myself wearing these all summer as loungewear or with shorts. If I sized down it would’ve given me more cleavage than I wanted. I may try taking in the liner a bit for more security near the end of summer when I’ve dropped weight. Great lululemon dupe. Comfortable and flattering. The ONLY con I have is that the size varied slightly by color. The black and white fit more snug (which I preferred). The denim blue and Jade green fit a little looser as you can see in the side profile picture of the denim blue set.  Shorts- these are great dupes as well! The back pocket completely fits my iPhone XR. The side pocket is super secure and deep. The shorts are slightly longer in the back. The high waist is pretty small and includes about an inch of tighter elastic. I personally like this for camp so my walkie doesn’t pull them down, but if you have more of a square figure it may pay to size up. The tank meets right where these shorts start. My only complaint on these is sometimes the way they lay can look a bit funky in the crotch area, but nothing too major. The colors all looked great. I wore the white with red underwear and it didn’t show through where the mesh liner was.  As a set- Black is perfect and what you’d expect. The white is a CRISP white. Like, it made me pull out my teeth whitener white. It’s beautiful, but literally my Snow White OPI nail polish even looked a tad dingy in comparison. The Jade green shorts were a slightly different shade than the tank. It was not enough for my husband to notice without telling him. For some reason it looks a lot different in the photo but they’re more similar in person. The blue is a pretty darn close match. If anything, the band is slightly different due to the different material. It’s not a dealbreaker for me, as I plan to mix and match a lot  Final thoughts- I love them. I sent both my sisters the links to them, I will live in them all summer, and I will be buying more sets in a variety of colors. Lululemon who?

I ordered a size medium in this top and the fit was tight. I am a little busty but my normal top size ranges from small to medium so I was a little disappointed when it didn’t fit right. I am 5,4 and 172lbs for reference.  The color was as shown and it is beautiful. The material was also quality and felt really nice, almost buttery soft. It has built in pads which can be removed also.  Overall it seems like a great product, even though I returned it due to sizing. If you order it I suggest ordering 1 size up!

评论概述: These are some of my favorite workout tank tops from Amazon!
评论详情: I have a few of these tank tops in different colors and I enjoy them very much. They have really good support and they’re comfortable. They also look good on you and they have padding on the inside. Pretty high-quality workout tank tops!

LOVE these tanks! I got one in 3 different colors. That was the first thing I noticed when they arrived - the colors ARE beautiful. Next, weight/feel of the fabric and construction. The fabric is moisture wicking so some weight is necessary to support that feature. There's a built-in bra for support, and removable pads. The pads seem kinda weirdly shaped - almost flat. I ordered the medium size despite the size guide recommendation because I got reprimanded(??!) by the AI that quite literally INSISTED I order the medium! It wouldn't even LET me add the size large to my cart 😅 resorting to what appeared to be a pop-up blockade!! I've said for some time that if there are any internet entities that know me well, Amazon is most assuredly near or at the top of that list.  Anyhow, I'm 5'1", 124lbs, a 36D, and I've been a gym rat since I was old enough to get into one - to give you an idea on physique. The medium really IS the best size choice for me, so thank you, Amazon AI! Back to the pads... Straight line on the bottom, dome shaped?? and flat-front. They made the armholes pucker because the fabric didn't want to accommodate my chest in this top with those pads. I took them out and replaced them with some I had from other sport bras that were much rounder in overall shape. Being able to swap the padding made a huge difference. I gotta say the ones that came with were more befitting a barely-A cup size. I couldn't take a star away for those crazy pads just because MY cup size isn't a standard medium. However, it seemed worth discussing.  Construction of these tanks are solid. I imagine these lasting a long time. They held up perfectly after washing. I washed them in cold water on the delicate cycle with low spin speed. I hung them to dry and ran them through my dryer for 5 minutes on air only, just to get the air-dry stiffness out of them.  Stitching is flawless - not a single loose thread anywhere - even after washing. And ZERO color fade, but I confess I wash nearly everything in Woolite as my base detergent.  If you're looking for a quality sports bra that easily doubles as a somewhat upscale tank, these are it! I do have to add that someone who is tall may find these short. I suspect the models they use are short-waisted. They are a perfect length on me at 5'1".  (This review is copy/pasted for the other two colors I ordered.)

Had big hopes to love this but the shelf bra is too short for big busted girls. The material is lovely and very comfortable. Overall the fit was good. Bought sizing based on bra size (38DDD). Only issue is the shelf bra is too short. The girls were falling out underneath. If I moved them up, they were spilling out the top. Even ordered a size bigger to see if that would provide the support underneath but it was too big everywhere. Very sad to return but needs to have longer shelf bra and/or higher cut on top to help cover the girls from spillage.

I need to buy more of these shirts because I wear them so often. You can dress it up or dress it down. I love the built-in bra. It makes my boobs look great. It fits fantastic. I just wish it was a little bit longer though. This one is great for working out and high waisted pants, but I really want to wear this with all of my outfits so wish that I had it came a little longer version as well.

This is such a comfortable and supportive sports bra. It is long enough to wear comfortably as a top in and outside of the gym. Not supportive enough for running but great for lifting and other low intensity workouts. I now have 2 of these and wear them all the time!

评论概述: Why are we still doing removable cup/padding?
评论详情: Bought a size small, I’m 5’3 approx 130-135lbs bra size 34C, fits true to size. Could’ve probably gone with a medium for a slightly looser fit, but I think the small holds the girls in place a little better. Nice athletic material, very soft and has a lot of stretch. 4stars because.. Just REMOVE THE PADS. Mine were all wonky and made my boobs look lumpy, you could also see the pad/cup through the shirt/bra. Got this on sale for $14.99, would not buy for the normal price of $26.99.
The material is great. The fitting is ideal and like the photos. I’m a taller girl at 5’9 so I wasn’t a fan of the length even after getting a large
This runs small so had to return and size up.
Love this top, so cute & very supportive. Started wearing while nursing & still supported great when I was done too. Size M - I’m 5'3” & 127 lbs

These are great. I am 5’7”, 130lbs with a DD cup and order a small. They are cute enough to wear as a top but comfy enough to wear under clothes as well. I’ve washed my first one quite a few times now and it is holding up well.

评论概述: Comfortable and the pads stay in place
评论详情: This tank top is so soft and fits me so well. I love the support. I love the color and I love how the padding stays in place and I don’t have to shift them around every single time I wash it
The material is super soft and supportive. I’m 5’2” and an A cup, and it fits perfectly. I will say the top scrunches up a tiny bit with movement, but not enough to where it’s a reason not to buy it.
I have a bigger chest and usually these tanks don’t fit me right. This one fits a lot better  and is also comfortable to wear
I love how comfy this is and it’s the perfect length to wear as a cropped top by itself or as a regular sports bra!
Size smaller than normal one.
I wear this top to work out all the time. I have it in several colors. Great support, love the built in bra. The fabric is thick. I have washed and dried several times and still looks brand new!!

So, I decided to order this top because I loved the same style top that Target has. I’m a size M in t-shirts, 36C, large in tank-tops, size 8/10 pants with a short torso. I ordered a size LARGE. Pros- the length is nice as it isn’t too revealing and pairs well with high waisted shorts, the material feels good quality, the color is as expected, it’s comfy Cons- compared to the target all in motion brand it definitely shows more curves and rolls lol. As you can see on my back the shirt doesn’t feel tight at all but still highlights the rolls. Whereas my target brand is double lined so it smooths things out. Totally just a personal critique but that’s my only con.

I am having issues with my shoulder and being a little large busted it is very hard to find support that does not aggravate my shoulder. This top works and feels great. No pressure on my shoulder and fits under shirts nicely if you don't want to wear it alone.
Great product . Fits well and very secure
This sports bra offers amazing coverage and lift. I want one in every color now 😍

Very cute and very fitted exercise top/bra. Seems well made! This fits very much like a bathing suit, even the material is similar to swimwear. It’s very cropped on me, so I’d caution that if you’re self-conscious around the tummy area it might draw attention to the spot you don’t want. It’s also rolling up slightly in the torso. I usually wear a small and I do think that the small was the right size to get. I like it, it’s just pretty revealing at the chest area also. Everyone has such different comfort levels with this stuff for exercise clothing. I might feel better wearing high waisted yoga pants with it!  The inner shelf bra seems supportive for me -great for walking/light activity, but for treadmill running I could use just a bit more support.

I was shocked by the quality of this coverup after rapidly going through beach coverups from Target and them deteriorating quickly. The quality feels so nice and silky, not a gauze-like material. It’s so cute!
I'm petite and the S fits well! Great quality and support is 4/5.
love this tank top and it fit very good
One of my most favorite tops! Would love to have one in every color

I wanted this to wear under a really wide neck sweatshirt and it is perfect. I’m usually a medium in brands like Athleta and I sized up to a large and this fit just right. A much for budget friendly option vs Athleta or Lululemon.
This provides ole Ty of support and is so comfortable and flattering!!

I love these so much, I have multiple. Super comfortable, breathable, flattering shape, etcetera. Great chest support. I'll wear these to work out at the gym, to ride horses in, and as an every day shirt (especially when I don't feel like wearing an actual bra). I get plenty of compliments when I'm out and about and wearing one of these. If you're on the fence about one of them... BUY IT!!
True to size i will size up the next time.
Has held up after several workouts and washes. Somewhat true to size, if you have a larger bust/need a larger cup size, definitely size up!

I got this in a large and it fits more like a top than a sports bra (34b, petite). Should have gotten a medium. But I can layer another bra underneath it. Love the fabric, color and the length is good. The fabric rides up though because it’s kind of loose. Overall will try this brand again
Not for every proportion. The small is too small in the bust but the medium would be too big around the bottom and hang funny in back. I just stuff myself into it and call it a day.

In the process of re-vamping my workout wear as I recently had a baby and my body has changed. I wanted something that was practical, comfortable, sturdy, and not too constricting on my chest (still breastfeeding). I bought this top in 3 colors and am overall happy with my purchase. I will note that the lighter colors definitely show "everything", so if you are self-conscious (like me) about any extra rolls or the like, those colors may not be for you. They also have a "built-in" bra, I didn't know that and though they were a seamless material, so the elastic band underneath does show through on the lighter colors, creating said rolls lol. But these tops hold everything in nicely and gently, material is comfortable, and they're flattering. I do wish they were just an inch longer, but I knew I was buying a cropped style. I'm a 32DD, size 2/4 pants, size S/M tops, and a Medium in this fits well
Super buttery top! and I love the color! doesnt roll up and perfect cropped size:)
Me quedó pequeña

I sized down after reading reviews, and that was a mistake. Ignore that advice and order the size you would normally wear. If I had done that, I wouldn't have to drive 80 miles to return these to UPS store. I ordered the white and the denim blue, and although I love the quality and colors, I will not be re-ordering, due to the hassel of returning them.  I also ordered the high waisted leggings with pocket in my normal size, and they fit perfectly. Lesson learned.

评论概述: First off the color is amazing!
评论详情: Based on recommendations I ordered the XL, these run small…It was tight! I decided to order 2 more in the XXL which fit very comfortably. I took them on vacation before returning the XL sizes and noticed they kind of stretched a bit, not a lot but made me wonder about giving the XL’s another chance. So I’ve been wearing the XL for two days now and it did give a bit, enough to wear it but it’s still a tad small, notice the bottom rides up a little which the XXL does not do. But I LOVE the color (light pink) which is not available in the XXL so I’m keeping it but I did take off one star because it rides up. Otherwise the material is great, seems like a good quality, has double layer in front so technically you could wear it on it’s own… not see through. Has removable pads for a little extra coverage. So all in all I like it.
You can kinda see the cups. It’s frustrating but if you get them in the right place it’s fine. I think a darker color would help with this problem.

评论概述: Nice sports braish top -comfy but runs small
评论详情: I like this top a lot to wear under another shirt when I work out. It’s much more comfortable than a lot of the sports bras and a regular bar. My only criticism would be that it runs small. I am a size 10/12 and I ordered the large and it is tight. I ordered another one and ordered the extra large and it fits very well.
I’m 36B (30.3” band, 36” bust) and this bra fits perfectly. It’s really snug so it’s perfect for the gym as well. Great quality for the price 😊
I bought this tank after it was recommended to me as a Lulu Align dupe and I like it! It’s a little bit looser than the original, maybe runs a little on the larger side but not enough to size down.

评论概述: sizing/fit is different from when I previously purchased it in 2020
评论详情: The sizing/fit of the tank is different from when I previously purchased it in 2020 (same exact item and size,  just different colors). I ordered 3 new colors, all in size Small, as this is the size I already own and love the fit of.  However, the newer tanks seem to be an entire size bigger than the one I own in the same size. I typically always wear XS in everything but my old tank is a Small and fits perfectly. So now I’m starting to wonder if my old tank was just mislabeled and is actually a true XS. The style and cut of the the new tanks appear to be the same, so I’m hoping I can just re-order them in an XS to achieve the same fit as my old one.

It’s my favorite sports bra in the sense that it is soft, and looks quite nice. However, I really wish they had a smaller size than just S. Im a small in most shirts, sometimes extra small. I do have a small rib cage, my bra band size is a 28. So their small feels more like a medium for me. It’s a bit loose around the ribs. If they had an XS, I’d probably buy 4 and recommend to all my gfs

This item runs big! I’m typically a M in workout tops but it was longer, cups size were bigger and just larger around the waist and ribs overall compared to most other workout tops. Super cute pink and seems super high quality so will be replacing for smaller size!
I am obsessed with this whole collection of athletic tank tops. I wear them all the time they are so comfortable and way cheaper than Lululemon.
Holds things in place

评论概述: Beautiful colors but the fit just isn't quite right
评论详情: I ordered a few of these in varying colors and in both small and medium. I ordered small and medium because I am very small around but my breasts are large for my body. I hoped to find the right fit ordering two different sizes but I didn't. The small fits perfectly except the 'bra' liner inside is way too small for me. The medium is a tiny bit too big but the liner is still way too small. It probably has more to do with my weird shape than the product itself. I love the colors and the shape of these though! I kept both sizes and am going to see if a seamstress can make some adjustments to get this just right. :)
I am obsessed with these! I've ordered them in 3 colors now. They fit perfectly, are so comfortable, and can be worn going out and about or to the gym! Love love love

评论概述: Modest enough, yet still very flattering!!!
评论详情: I have had this on my wishlist for over a year, but I wanted something that wasn’t too low cut for the gym. They had a great sale, so I decided I would just go for it, and try the fit for myself. My only regret is that I didn’t get this sooner because it ended up being absolutely perfect!!! I am very short, but on the more muscular side, and I have a pretty small chest. Despite my small cup size, I still wanted something with decent support without a push-up effect. I like that it fits in a way to enhance my figure without emphasizing it. Because of my shorter torso, finding a work out tank can be difficult because I want it to sit right at my waistband. Other brands are very generous with their cropping, but this brand really nails the long crop!!! This would definitely sit above someone else’s belly button, but on me, it is only a touch above. Because of this, it makes a great tank top for not just taller people with a belly button ring, but shorter people as well who have one too!! Also there is not a whole lot of side tissue or underarm fat being pronounced, which is rare with other snug fitting sport bras. I don’t have a lot to work with in the cup, but I usually have a bit of spillage that I don’t have here. The picture shows it exactly as I put it on, with minimal adjustments just for symmetry. For someone who is looking for more cleavage, you can definitely fluff it up by hoisting the side tissue towards the middle of the tank. I vary between a 32C, 34C, and a 34B bra and am 10 years post breastfeeding. I would feel enough support and security for a light jog, or otherwise pretty moderate activity working out. Someone else with a similar proportioned body, or slightly bigger cup size would probably feel the same way too, but anything bigger might want to save these only for a lower activity level. All in all a great top, and will definitely be coming back periodically for more colors!!!

I can wear this top for more casual outfits when I’m out running errands. Great support. It does roll on the bottom which is my only complaint. Not see through at all. I’ve also worn this to work out in and it keeps you dry. It’s a bit more cropped than what I’m comfortable with so I do wear it with high waisted bottoms
Love the color and it fits true to size.

The material is extremely soft, I feel like my breasts are supported if I were to go for a jog or workout. I do think I might have needed a small as the sides pop out in the corners. I recommend sizing down if uncertain between sizes (if you’re looking for more support and tightness).

评论概述: Great top for low-imact spin and pilates
评论详情: I have ten of these in both medium and large in black, white, dark gray, purple, pink and rose. I originally purchased two in large since I hate workout tops cutting into my back, but I later purchased 3 in medium for a tighter fit for high-impact classes. The top is flattering and the pads are of good quality. I appreciate the white is not see-through but the newer one in rose seems to be of thinner material. The material is more like swimwear or shiny workout wear which does not really match the flat fabric of Vuori or some Lululemon align but who is really looking that close? There is some variance in the sheen and weight of the fabric by colors. Black was very shiny.  In large the straps seem a bit longer with straps looser on the shoulders so I pull them up and the length falls lower below the waist. Medium the top in the lighter colors shows everything and they are shorter just above waist level so I am pulling down to cover my stomach sometimes. I just purchased 2 more in large to have some looser options this summer. I would not recommend this top for running or HIIT as they are best for low impact or smaller chest sizes.  They wash and dry very well in the dryer. I put them in garment bags during the wash to keep the tops and pads together. The pads are pretty indestructible but a few separated the foam and liners after a while. Photo is a large. The medium runs like a size 6-8 of other workout brands if that helps.
I have sensitive skin and some camisoles and bras are really uncomfortable. This is soft and much more comfortable.

I’d like to start off by saying these are VERY cute. I got them in two different colors, red and light green, but both in Mediums (I tend to wear size smalls but decided to size up). The red one that I got is very tight. It fits and it’s cute, but definitely tighter than I was expecting. The green one I got (again, the same size) was slightly larger than the red one. Still kind of tight but in a good way, it fit the way it looks in the photos. They’re the same material, so it’s just a bit odd that they fit differently. I’m keeping them both, I think the green one I can wear both as a a sports bra and a shirt, and the red I may just stick to wearing as a sports bra under other clothes. Again. These are VERY cute and I like the quality. Just prepared to maybe order a couple of different of sizes of these shirts to find your best fit.
One of my favorite tops
Great top. No need for a bra. Very supportive and sleek.
I bought like 3 different colors because it fits me soo good

I got this top in two different colors and was so excited for them! I bought a medium and I’m a D cup. It wasn’t too tight or too loose. I wore it to the gym and it did NOT hold in the girls. Learned my lesson and now I wear a sport bra under this top because the built in bra isn’t supportive enough.
High quality fabric, built in bra sits just right.  I love it so much I’m buying them in every color  Edit: the Red is BRIGHT not the burnt orangey red it looks in the photo
Made well. Price great. Like the feel and fabric but ran very small. Not good for my body type.

Overall this is decent and it does the job when I am working out.  I ordered a L which in this type of sports bra is normally perfect.  This one ran a bit small in the cups so It did not fit as well as some others I have purchased.  I do like the material and the way it holds up to weight lifting.

The design and quality of the fabric is good but the sizing is too tight. I fall right in the middle of what the size guide calls medium and it was so tight on the band that I couldn’t breathe. I am a 36c.
This is a good-quality sports bra that has a fashionable design and built in bra for support. The material is easy-to-wash.
I purchased to large of a size the first time and exchanged it for a smaller one. The fabric is thick and high quality. It’s very supportive - I’m a 36D and this is great.

Love this top; it's comfortable and washes well. Sizing was a little tricky. I first ordered based off the size chart, but found it wasn't accurate and had to size up. Once I had the size right, it was great and I've ordered several more colors.
No dislikes 1. Good construction 2. Length is good, not so long that has to be tucked 3. Secure fit without pinching
Seems like a great value, similar to other more expensive brands. Maybe size down if you are between sizes.

评论概述: Great material but small built in bra
评论详情: I absolutely love this top, except for the fact that my chest doesn’t fit in it. I got a medium, and it fits perfectly, but my chest constantly slips out the bottom of the built-in bra.

Sizing: I am 5'1, 145lbs and usually wear a 34D or DD in bras depending only the brand. I got a medium but ended out returning for a large. (UPDATE: got the large today and the straps are slightly too long which is causing gapping in my armpits, probably should stick with a medium). The medium sizing I slightly spilled out of the top and bottom of the cami and the top just rode up on my waist while moving around. I think you could get away with medium if you are okay with a slightly tighter top. But you will get spillage. I was worried about the straps coming of my shoulder but the medium was fine, didn't need any adjusting. Comes with cups you can remove and a built in cami.  Comparison to other products:  Lululemon align tanks is made of 89% nylon 11% elastane for a whopping $68.  This Amazon top is $18-22 and is 80% polyamide and 20% spandex. Polyamide and nylon are almost the same. Nylon is a type of polyamide.  Target makes a dupe and it's $22 and it's 69% recycled polyester and 31% spandex. (polyester is plastic, not an amazing material for workout clothing and it'll ruin way faster than nylon or polyamide due to friction and heat).  TLDR: this top is way better bang for your buck in terms of materials than Lululemon 🤪
This sports bra is so soft and cozy but it is so low cut that I worry my chest will pop out the top.

评论概述: BE CAREFUL TO MEASURE THE LENGTH BETWEEN BOOBS AND WAIST IN INCHES
评论详情: The LENGTH OF BAND ON BOTTOM OF BRALETTE WAS FOR LONG WAISTED PERSON.  NO PROBLEM RETURNING.

I really like this top! I was worried about sizing since I’ve kind of been all over the place. I’ve been a small for a long time but now I’m more of a medium. First, to help others on sizing- I am 5’2” and probably around 140ish lbs, I carry most of my weight in my hips and thighs, but also a little in my stomach lately. My chest measurement is about 36b and waist is around 29” right now give or take an inch. The medium in the black was PERFECT for me. It fit my waist without being to tight or too loose (probably closer to being almost loose, but the way it draped I was not bothered by it at all and found it flattering) Bought this for mostly hiking/backpacking/camping/dance classes, not so much high impact workouts. It worked perfect for those needs. My ONLY gripe is I think this would actually be better for someone with either a smaller chest than me OR a bit larger. Let me explain. The pads included were pretty intense and seemed to squish my boobs quite a bit since they seemed to take up the internal room of the top. Once I took it out I was MUCH more comfortable. But in general the top kind of flattens and pancakes my boobs a bit? Sometimes I wear a long sleeve over too depending on the temperature I’ll be in, and it makes my boobs look weirdly flat. It’s more ok with just the top on itself. But it does give me a little bit of squished cleavage, I’m not sure how that’s happening. I think if you are smaller chested you’ll get nice cleavage with the pads, and if you are LARGER chested I actually think it will work ok because it seems to force the fabric more outward. So I think it would work out for you in that way. But if you’re in the middle it’s… tolerable if you’re not too worried about squashing the chest. I personally am getting to an age where I am starting to worry about creating a big permanent wrinkle from the line of my cleavage. So I will probably go for the big brand next time. But I think it’s decent. It is starting to pill a little after a couple washes and hang dry, but it doesn’t look that bad and I can get a depilling shaver if needed or use a dull used razor. 3.5/5

评论概述: Not a sports bra for the more buxum.
评论详情: There is absolutely no support in this bra.  It’s fine for a crop top, but I will never wear this to any kind of workout, not even yoga.  As a 32D, I want and need support especially for higher impact activities like tennis, cycling or yoga.
it fits so nice, def get it.

I really like this top! But I saw all the reviews and said it was better to choose one size more than what you usually wear. So I am S and I chose M it doesn’t fit as tight as I would have liked but it is not too bad.  I would like to buy more colors but my real size “S”

I love this top. I think it looks great as a shirt with some high waisted pants. It offers me enough support to be able to wear it while just hanging out. I also used it as a swimsuit top in a pinch. For me being large chested it did not offer the amount of support I would like for working out but I still like it alot!

评论概述: Sizing…or not good for large rib cage?
评论详情: I really thought a medium would work based on sizing chart and customer reviews, but I bought three of these and had to return all. I am 5’6”, 130 lbs, 36D, but I have a large rib cage. The tops were tight across my chest, and then they were just too short in an uncomfortable way around my ribs. It’s almost too compressive? Maybe if I tried the large, but I think I like wearing a sports bra better and having a more comfortable top for working out.  No issues with quality, color.

I needed more align tops so I decided to give this one a try. For reference I’m a size 8 in lululemon align tops, size 6 in all the other non form fitting tops. It’s very comfortable and lightweight. I went with a medium fits great in the chest but the sleeves are a little loose on me. It’s a great alternative to the lulu top. My only issue with it is if you are doing hot classes like hot yoga you will feel like it soaked that’s one benefit the lulu top has. But if you don’t do heated workouts you should be fine. I did take a hot hitt class yesterday and it provided better support in the chest area than my lulu top. Not super supportive but better in comparison. I can see myself buying more for  both athleisure wear and cycling them in to my workout clothes.

When it comes to finding the perfect sports bra that strikes the right balance between comfort, support, and style, the GYM PEOPLE Women's Sports Bra truly stands out. As someone who values both an active lifestyle and high-quality athletic wear, I can confidently say that this sports bra exceeded my expectations in every way.  The first thing that caught my attention was the longline design, which not only adds a trendy touch but also provides additional coverage and support. The extended band beneath the bust ensures that the bra stays securely in place, eliminating any worries of constant readjustment during workouts. Whether I'm hitting the gym for a high-intensity session or engaging in outdoor activities, the longline design keeps everything in place, allowing me to move freely without any discomfort.  One of the standout features of this sports bra is its wire-free construction. This design choice is a game-changer for individuals who prioritize comfort without sacrificing support. The absence of wires eliminates any potential chafing or discomfort that traditional bras might cause, making it an excellent choice for long workout sessions. The gentle yet effective medium support offered by the GYM PEOPLE sports bra keeps everything secure without feeling overly restrictive.  The padded cups further enhance the comfort factor. The padding strikes the right balance between providing modesty and maintaining a natural shape. I appreciated that the padding is removable, giving me the flexibility to customize the bra's feel based on my preference for each activity.  In terms of style, the GYM PEOPLE sports bra doesn't disappoint. The sleek and modern design, coupled with a variety of color options, allows me to effortlessly pair it with my activewear collection. Whether I'm layering it under a tank top or wearing it as a standalone piece, I feel confident and stylish.  Durability is another noteworthy aspect. Despite frequent use and washes, the sports bra has retained its shape, elasticity, and color vibrancy, indicating its high-quality construction and materials.  This product does run big so size down !!

First of all, I did the bust and seam measurement and mine came out to Bust-33”, Seam- 30”. I am typically either a 34B or 32C. No bra seems to fit me absolutely perfectly. In looking at the dimensions and sizing chart, it seems my best option was to go for a medium size, though I typically wear a small. As we can see in the photos, it is not a perfect fit (these sports bras rarely are for me) and there are some gaps to be considered. The photos were taking from a try-on after opening package, so it’s a bit wrinkled and not flattering in that way, but that can be remedied by a wash cycle.  Onto the gap at the base. On one hand, I consider this a pro, because I deeply dislike that band on certain tops that digs into the skin. When I have a top on, I don’t want to feel constricted anywhere, otherwise it is extremely uncomfortable. In this case, as seen in photos, it actually curves outward in the back, which is not necessarily flattering, but for my purposes of wearing around the house or running errands with a cardigan, it’ll work.  Another pro is the cups and band, which fit comfortably without causing too much compression or pain. Now, if you’re a 34B/32C like me, and in the market for cleavage and don’t care about the side flat boob look and mainly care about the front look, going smaller would be your best bet for that.  When I am seated, there is an obvious gap in the side boob area, and the shoulder bands lift up a little. Again, not a complete deal breaker, but not an obvious fit.  Consensus is that it is a comfortable top for lounging in and providing support if you are going out and don’t want the nips exposed. If you size up and want it to look better, I recommend a cardigan as it will address all of the issues that I mentioned. If you are using for gym purposes, sizing down may be preferable, for compression sake. Ultimately, it is a great top and I can appreciate the comfort at sizing up provided. I, for one value comfort and quality material over look. I work from home and wear this to lounge around, with, and without a cardigan.

评论概述: Did not expect to love these so much!
评论详情: I have had zero luck ever buying bras online, whether from Amazon or from high end stores - I guess I'm super hard to fit. Let's just say I have a lot of volume and getting that full coverage & comfy fit seems to be impossible. I am also at the age where I have decided underwires can take a hike - I'm going for comfort first and foremost. That said, I don't want to look like I'm overstuffed and popping out of the top, but also don't want the opposite problem of gaping on the sides. I took a whim on these not expecting them to fit. And I was worried that even a XXL would be too small given where these are made. I was shocked that they are PERFECT. I also thought for sure the padding would not suit me, and I'd need to remove and toss those inserts. Nope - not even close. These are amazing and so comfortable. I'm wearing them for working out (at home), and also wearing them as bras underneath my normal clothes. For a little extra support while working out, I did take a hair tie and have my husband gather the two straps in the back and "tie" them together. That gave me just enough of extra add'l support. For the price, I don't mind taking this extra step. I've already ordered 5 more. Love these so much.

I bought this to go with a gypsy skirt for a renissanse festival outfit. The boob pads are strange, though I've never bought a shirt like this so maybe it's normal. The shirt is soft and comfortable for the most part. I am in-between a medium and a large because I have a larger rib cage than most. The medium works but a large might have been better.

评论概述: Comfortable material but not for bigger busts
评论详情: I bought this specifically for the tank aspect of it. The material is soft and very comfortable. But the coverage in the bust is just not adequate. For reference I wear a 38D and ordered 2XL and the top does not coverage the cleavage area and the girls don't stay put. Also the front of the tank rides up pretty easily with any sort of exertion. So ok to wear around the house, but definitely not going outside with it.
Fits true to size. Would buy again.

I love these tops! I bought an extra large and I am planning on sizing down in the near future. They maintain their size and shape after washing. The inserts are thicks, I personally removed them.  They are buttery soft and don't have that weird texture that I sometimes find in workout clothes. As I bought this a size too big I wouldn't be comfortable doing an intense workout in it. But for walking and upper body strength it holds up.

评论概述: Armpit stains and dirt stains don't wash out
评论详情: This top was great for a few wears and then it showed why it is the price it is. The armpits stained really easily. Otherwise it fit well.

评论概述: So Comfortable and Plus Size Friendly
评论详情: This sports bra is so comfortable and I don't even have to wear a shirt over it if I don't want to because it provides a lot of coverage (I work out at home, though).  I am a 1X in tops, 2X/18 in pants and weigh about 220 lbs at 5'7". I carry most of my weight in my belly. Purchased the XXLarge and it fits perfectly with lots of breathing room. The size chart doesn't cover all the sizes offered so I hope the measurements i provided help. I also purchased the 3XL but I didn't even try it on because the XXLarge fits so comfortably. It was really easy to put on and to remove. No struggles at all. It has decent support and a built in shelf bra. It doesn't roll up which is usually a problem with these types of long shirt styled bras. I can see why this bra is a best seller! Sadly, the XXL size only comes in white and black which is BORING. Please expand the colors options so I can buy several of them and replace all my sport bras. This brand has been impressing me with every item buy from them so I hope they continue with quality products.

I’m a true medium in most tops with 34DD mom boobs. I feel like this top was a little large compare to other sports bras. Though the fabric is phenomenal and comfortable, I found the straps are too long to provide the support i need. It fit great everywhere else, though!

评论用户: Always a book in my face!
评论详情: No back fat for us zaftig gals.  LOVE the fit, just wish was made with different material. Every time I put it on, feels like I’m putting on a bathing suit top.  Room for improvement for sure.
Really great support! I have a larger bust and this holds everything in place! Does really well in the wash too!

I give this 4 stars because the cut is super cute and I love the fit. It just has one major flaw. The band on the bra under the top layer of fabric has this weird seam that can be seen through. I don’t know if it is more visible because I have a smaller chest, but it is a major buzz kill. After noticing it, you can’t unsee it. I ordered the denim blue and jasmine green. The green one has the exact same design flaw. It’s just a weird bump pattern showing through.  I love the amount of colors to choose from. The denim blue does show up a little more gray and dark than pictured.  UPDATE: I’ve washed the top 4 times now and although the weird bump pattern is still there, it is MUCH less noticeable now that the fabric has softened up. I am very pleased with the purchase. Buying another color now :)
The top isn’t bad, but it isn’t my favorite. It fits kind of weird and isn’t the most comfortable. But I will still use!

评论概述: Comfy and I like the material
评论详情: I ordered an XS.  Typically wear 34B.  I like the material and the fact it doesn't fit too tight on my back and I feel I can breathe.  The length is great and I can wear it under a blazer. My only issue with these products are the cup inserts.  They are annoying to keep in place, even after washing by hand.
Amazing product. Great quality . I love that I can wear whenever and use as a gym tank. Great color!
I am a postpartum mom and wanted to get a bigger workout tank... this is more like a braw than a tank... I feel like I have to wear a shirt over it...
I was pleasantly surprised at the support, the cup inserts somewhat show through the shirt but they’re good for helping support and nip coverage
